sentences: Meil oli hea aeg New Yorgis USA-s
context: The word 'usa' in Estonian refers to the United States of America, commonly known as America or US. It is used as a common noun to refer to the country. In Estonian, it appears in both upper and lower case forms, with 'USA' being the standard written form while 'usa' might appear in lowercase contexts like sentence beginnings or informal writing.
